text: <@UJFN50C00> I like 7 GUIs, except for the Cells task. That's often not done, including by me when I did them 4 years ago. I've done spreadsheets before, but the task is very specific, and even the creator of the project uses other libs to do it. If there's not a table widget available, you're rolling a lot of code, or using someone else's.

elements.text: I like 7 GUIs, except for the Cells task. That's often not done, including by me when I did them 4 years ago. I've done spreadsheets before, but the task is very specific, and even the creator of the project uses other libs to do it. If there's not a table widget available, you're rolling a lot of code, or using someone else's.
